law.catch_line: Wholesalers, distributors or processors to indicate in writing the place of origin.
law.text: Any wholesaler, distributor or processor of fresh meat or fresh meat product who sells, exposes for sale, delivers or transfers any meat or meat product which is produced outside of the United States shall indicate to the retailer, purchaser or transferee in writing, that the meat or meat product is produced outside of the United States and shall indicate to the retailer, purchaser or transferee in writing, the place of origin of the meat or meat product.
law.history: Created 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 142, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1988.
